attributes.action: We want parliament to BAN ALL loud fireworks that go BANG or explode !
attributes.additional_details: Anyone with health issues (e.g. Heart problems) and war veterans  are so frightened when these loud bangs/explosions go off, we dread the outcome !!!!!!!!!!!
attributes.background:
No one wants to stop anyone's fun, but the loud bangs/explosions are frightening, not only to pets and animals, but to those with health problems and those who have served and remembered the wars! 
Plus with the constant threats of terrorism, the time has come to ban them.
